Build Your Portfolio

A strong portfolio is essential for landing AI jobs. Check out this model portfolio for inspiration.

Portfolio Checklist

  • Professional headshot
  • Clear value proposition / tagline
  • 3+ projects with descriptions
  • Skills section with technologies
  • Contact information
  • LinkedIn profile link
  • GitHub profile with activity
  • Downloadable resume (PDF)
